element.name: Seat Occupied
element.definition: Indication if seat is occupied based on seat sensor data.
element.v3Comment: Based on Vehicular Emergency Data Set: Occupied - Associated with each seat. Vehicular Emergency Data Set (VEDS) Recommendations. Version 3.0 Prepared: (February 2011) by the Advanced Automatic Crash Notification (AACN)Joint APCO/NENA Data Standardization Working Group.
element.v3Changes: Added to better incorporate advanced automated collision notification information.
